<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Goggles of Night](/Equipment.aspx?ID=438)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 610 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The opaque crystal lenses of these sleek goggles do not obscure vision, but rather enhance it. While wearing the goggles, you gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks involving sight.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** Rotating the lenses 90 degrees, you gain darkvision for 1 hour. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Goggles of Night
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 610 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Goggles of Night (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 610 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +2, and the darkvision lasts until you rotate the lenses back or the item is no longer invested by you, whichever comes first.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Goggles of Night (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 610 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 20,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +3, and the goggles grant greater darkvision, which lasts until you rotate the lenses back or the item is no longer invested by you, whichever comes first.
